sentences.sentence: As the Kazakhstan civil unrest continues, cryptocurrency enthusiasts are closely monitoring the country's Bitcoin mining industry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The former Soviet Republic became a major Bitcoin mining hub following the Chinese crackdown on the activity last year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
